function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Difficulty in manually adjusting behavior-generating parameters for simulations with many occupants may lead to inefficiency and potential errors.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data, accuracy","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks in iot data sharing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowding during funerals","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of covid-19 transmission in transient housing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic-buying and stockpiling of food products","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in concentration of pharmaceutical products in wastewater may lead to environmental contamination and health risks.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systemic gaps in community resilience","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suspension of aerosols up to 10 μm in diameter indoors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk of exposure to small aerosols due to the movement of people in buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Faster diffusion of knowledge among academics may facilitate mitigation strategies, increasing the risk of infection spread.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of traps and targets for pest control","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Associations of density and socio-demographic factors with covid-19 mortality","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data cleaning and preprocessing using regex library","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Narrow control clauses in commercial office tenancy agreements may lead to suboptimal indoor temperature management, potentially impacting occupant comfort and energy efficiency.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accessibility of pharmaceutical interventions in developing countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation to pcr-based methods for virus concentration and detection in wastewater.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inflexible boundaries and limits in building governance","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the hospitality sector due to job losses among immigrants.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"States of emergency and ’emergency thinking’ may preclude locally led and adapted responses, hindering effectiveness and harm reduction.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene practices may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases during the study.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of tangible resource allocation models for resilience planning","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability of home quarantine experience based on home conditions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in primary energy consumption due to economic slowdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to the buildup of airborne contaminants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Link between air pollution and virus spread","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to effectively implement social distancing and other physical constraints in the built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of communication and education","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low recall in manual labeling","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conflict of interest declaration is missing","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased sanitation requirements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of employee awareness","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the interconnected smart systems and devices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased waste, risk of contamination","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared article downloads and access to online library resources.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global pandemic impact on social housing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher energy consumption of wifi infrastructure compared to other options may impact operational costs and sustainability of the built risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential failure of other coating technologies amine and ammonium-based polymers to inactivate the virus","category":"Public health
